00020 inline void longitudinal_bigaussian(ftype sigma_dt, ftype sigma_dE = 0,
00021                                     int seed = 0, bool reinsertion = false)
00022 {
00023     auto GP = Context::GP;
00024     auto RfP = Context::RfP;
00025     auto Beam = Context::Beam;
00026     if (GP->n_sections > 1) {
00027         std::cerr << "WARNING: longitudinal_bigaussian is not yet properly\n"
00028                   << "computed for several sections!\n";
00029     }
00030     if (RfP->n_rf > 1) {
00031         std::cerr << "WARNING: longitudinal_bigaussian for multiple RF\n"
00032                   << "is not yet implemented\n";
00033     }
00034 
00035     uint counter = RfP->counter;
00036     ftype harmonic = RfP->harmonic[0][counter];
00037     ftype energy = GP->energy[0][counter];
00038     ftype beta = GP->beta[0][counter];
00039     ftype omega_RF = RfP->omega_RF[0][counter];
00040     ftype phi_s = RfP->phi_s[counter];
00041     ftype phi_RF = RfP->phi_RF[0][counter];
00042     ftype eta0 = RfP->eta_0(counter);
00043 
00044     if (sigma_dE == 0) {
00045         auto voltage = GP->charge * RfP->voltage[0][counter];
00046         auto phi_b = omega_RF * sigma_dt + phi_s;
00047         sigma_dE =
00048             sqrt(voltage * energy * beta * beta *
00049                  (cos(phi_b) - cos(phi_s) + (phi_b - phi_s) * sin(phi_s)) /
00050                  (constant::pi * harmonic * eta0));
00051     }
00052 
00053     Beam->sigma_dE = sigma_dE;
00054     Beam->sigma_dt = sigma_dt;
00055     // std::cout << "eta0: " << eta0 << "\n";
00056     // std::cout << sigma_dE << "\n";
00057     // std::cout << sigma_dt << "\n";
00058     // std::cout << (phi_s - phi_RF) / omega_RF << "\n";
00059     if (seed < 0) {
00060         f_vector_t random;
00061         // std::string home = util::GETENV("TEST_FILES");
00062         util::read_vector_from_file(random, TEST_FILES "/normal_distribution.dat");
00063         for (uint i = 0; i < Beam->n_macroparticles; ++i) {
00064             ftype r = random[i % random.size()];
00065             // ftype r = distribution(generator);
00066             if (eta0 > 0)
00067                 Beam->dt[i] = sigma_dt * r
00068                               + (phi_s - phi_RF) / omega_RF;
00069             else
00070                 Beam->dt[i] = sigma_dt * r
00071                               + (phi_s - phi_RF - constant::pi) / omega_RF;
00072             Beam->dE[i] = sigma_dE * r;
00073             // dprintf("beam_dE: %.8lf \n", Beam->dE[i]);
00074         }
00075     } else {
00076         std::default_random_engine generator(seed);
00077         std::normal_distribution<ftype> distribution(0.0, 1.0);
00078         for (uint i = 0; i < Beam->n_macroparticles; ++i) {
00079             ftype r = distribution(generator);
00080             if (eta0 > 0)
00081                 Beam->dt[i] = sigma_dt * r + (phi_s - phi_RF) / omega_RF;
00082             else
00083                 Beam->dt[i] =
00084                     sigma_dt * r + (phi_s - phi_RF - constant::pi) / omega_RF;
00085             r = distribution(generator);
00086             Beam->dE[i] = sigma_dE * r;
00087         }
00088         // for (uint i = 0; i < Beam->n_macroparticles; ++i)
00089         // Beam->dE[i] = sigma_dE * distribution(generator);
00090     }
00091 
00092     // TODO if reinsertion == true
00093     if (reinsertion) {
00094         ;
00095     }
00096 }

00101 void _matched_from_line_density(ftype beta, ftype energy, ftype charge,
00102                                 int n_macroparticles, f_vector_t &dt, f_vector_t &dE,
00103                                 ftype eta_0, ftype t_rev_0,
00104                                 f_vector_t &potential_well_array,
00105                                 f_vector_t &time_coord_array,
00106                                 std::map<std::string, std::string> line_density_opt,
00107                                 std::string main_harmonic,
00108                                 std::string plot,
00109                                 std::string figdir,
00110                                 std::string half_option,
00111                                 std::map<std::string, std::string> extraVoltageDict,
00112                                 int n_iterations_input,
00113                                 int seed
00114                                )
00115 {
00116     // python::initialize();
00117     python::import();
00118     auto pFunc = python::import("distributions", "matched_from_line_density");
00119 
00120     auto pBeta = python::convert_double(beta);
00121     auto pEnergy = python::convert_double(energy);
00122     auto pCharge = python::convert_double(charge);
00123     auto pNMacroparticles = python::convert_int(n_macroparticles);
00124     auto pEta0 = python::convert_double(eta_0);
00125     auto pTRev0 = python::convert_double(t_rev_0);
00126     auto pMainHarmonic = python::convert_string(main_harmonic);
00127     auto pPlot = python::convert_string(plot);
00128     auto pFigDir = python::convert_string(figdir);
00129     auto pHalfOption = python::convert_string(half_option);
00130     auto pNIterationsInput = python::convert_int(n_iterations_input);
00131     auto pSeed = python::convert_int(seed);
00132     auto pDT = python::convert_double_array(dt.data(), dt.size());
00133     auto pDE = python::convert_double_array(dE.data(), dE.size());
00134 
00135     auto pPotentialWell = python::convert_double_array(potential_well_array.data(),
00136                           potential_well_array.size());
00137 
00138     auto pTimeCoord = python::convert_double_array(time_coord_array.data(),
00139                       time_coord_array.size());
00140 
00141     auto pLineDensityOpt = python::convert_dictionary(line_density_opt);
00142     auto pExtraVoltageDict = python::convert_dictionary(extraVoltageDict);
00143 
00144     auto ret = PyObject_CallFunctionObjArgs(pFunc, pBeta, pEnergy,
00145                                             pCharge, pNMacroparticles,
00146                                             pDT, pDE, pEta0, pTRev0,
00147                                             pPotentialWell, pTimeCoord,
00148                                             pLineDensityOpt, pMainHarmonic, pPlot,
00149                                             pFigDir, pHalfOption, pExtraVoltageDict,
00150                                             pNIterationsInput, pSeed, NULL);
00151     assert(ret);
00152 
00153 
00154     // python::finalize();
00155 }

00158 void matched_from_line_density(FullRingAndRf *full_ring,
00159                                std::map<std::string, std::string> line_density_opt,
00160                                std::string main_harmonic = "lowest_freq",
00161                                std::string plot = "",
00162                                std::string figdir = "fig",
00163                                std::string half_option = "first",
00164                                std::map<std::string, std::string> extraVoltageDict =
00165                                    std::map<std::string, std::string>(),
00166                                int n_iterations_input = 100,
00167                                int seed = 0
00168                               )
00169 {
00170     auto GP = Context::GP;
00171     auto Beam = Context::Beam;
00172 
00173     int n_points_potential = int(1e4);
00174 
00175     full_ring->potential_well_generation(0, n_points_potential, 0, 0.4);
00176 
00177 
00178     _matched_from_line_density(GP->beta[0][0],
00179                                GP->energy[0][0],
00180                                GP->charge,
00181                                Beam->n_macroparticles,
00182                                Beam->dt,
00183                                Beam->dE,
00184                                GP->eta_0[0][0],
00185                                GP->t_rev[0],
00186                                full_ring->fPotentialWell,
00187                                full_ring->fPotentialWellCoordinates,
00188                                line_density_opt,
00189                                main_harmonic,
00190                                plot,
00191                                figdir,
00192                                half_option,
00193                                extraVoltageDict,
00194                                n_iterations_input,
00195                                seed);
00196     // util::dump(Beam->dt, "dt");
00197 
00198 }

00203 void _matched_from_distribution_density(ftype beta, ftype energy, ftype charge,
00204                                         int n_macroparticles,
00205                                         f_vector_t &dt, f_vector_t &dE,
00206                                         ftype eta_0, ftype t_rev_0,
00207                                         f_vector_t &potential_well_array,
00208                                         f_vector_t &time_coord_array,
00209                                         std::map<std::string, std::string> distribution_opt,
00210                                         std::string main_harmonic,
00211                                         int n_iterations_input,
00212                                         std::map<std::string, std::string> extraVoltageDict,
00213                                         int seed
00214                                        )
00215 {
00216 
00217     // python::initialize();
00218     python::import();
00219 
00220     auto pFunc = python::import("distributions", "matched_from_distribution_density");
00221     auto pBeta = python::convert_double(beta);
00222     auto pNMacroparticles = python::convert_int(n_macroparticles);
00223     auto pDT = python::convert_double_array(dt.data(), dt.size());
00224     auto pEnergy = python::convert_double(energy);
00225     auto pCharge = python::convert_double(charge);
00226     auto pEta0 = python::convert_double(eta_0);
00227     auto pTRev0 = python::convert_double(t_rev_0);
00228     auto pMainHarmonic = python::convert_string(main_harmonic);
00229     auto pNIterationsInput = python::convert_int(n_iterations_input);
00230     auto pSeed = python::convert_int(seed);
00231     auto pDE = python::convert_double_array(dE.data(), dE.size());
00232 
00233     auto pPotentialWell = python::convert_double_array(potential_well_array.data(),
00234                           potential_well_array.size());
00235 
00236     auto pTimeCoord = python::convert_double_array(time_coord_array.data(),
00237                       time_coord_array.size());
00238 
00239     auto pDistributionOpt = python::convert_dictionary(distribution_opt);
00240     auto pExtraVoltageDict = python::convert_dictionary(extraVoltageDict);
00241 
00242     auto ret = PyObject_CallFunctionObjArgs(pFunc, pBeta, pEnergy,
00243                                             pCharge, pNMacroparticles,
00244                                             pDT, pDE, pEta0, pTRev0,
00245                                             pPotentialWell, pTimeCoord,
00246                                             pDistributionOpt, pMainHarmonic,
00247                                             pNIterationsInput,
00248                                             pExtraVoltageDict,
00249                                             pSeed, NULL);
00250     assert(ret);
00251 
00252     // python::finalize();
00253 
00254 
00255 }
